mapper.select: select * from v_wfcustomprocess t1 where wfcustomprocessid=#{id}
select * from v_wfcustomprocess t1 where wfcustomprocessid=#{id}
select * from v_wfcustomprocess t1 where wfcustomprocessid=#{id}
select * from v_wfcustomprocess t1 where wfcustomprocessid=#{id}
select * from v_wfcustomprocess t1 where wfcustomprocessid=#{id}
select * from v_wfcustomprocess t1 where wfcustomprocessid=#{id}
mapper.sql: SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.MEMO, t1.PROCESSOBJECT, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.VERSION, t1.WFCUSTOMPROCESSID, t1.WFCUSTOMPROCESSNAME FROM T_SRFWFCUSTOMPROCESS t1
SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`MEMO`, t1.`PROCESSOBJECT`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`VERSION`, t1.`WFCUSTOMPROCESSID`, t1.`WFCUSTOMPROCESSNAME` FROM `T_SRFWFCUSTOMPROCESS` t1
SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.MEMO, t1.PROCESSOBJECT, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.VERSION, t1.WFCUSTOMPROCESSID, t1.WFCUSTOMPROCESSNAME FROM T_SRFWFCUSTOMPROCESS t1

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.MEMO AS MEMO, t1.PROCESSOBJECT AS PROCESSOBJECT, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN, t1.VERSION AS VERSION, t1.WFCUSTOMPROCESSID AS WFCUSTOMPROCESSID, t1.WFCUSTOMPROCESSNAME AS WFCUSTOMPROCESSNAME FROM T_SRFWFCUSTOMPROCESS t1

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.MEMO AS MEMO, t1.PROCESSOBJECT AS PROCESSOBJECT, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN, t1.VERSION AS VERSION, t1.WFCUSTOMPROCESSID AS WFCUSTOMPROCESSID, t1.WFCUSTOMPROCESSNAME AS WFCUSTOMPROCESSNAME FROM T_SRFWFCUSTOMPROCESS t1
SELECT t1.[CREATEDATE], t1.[CREATEMAN], t1.[MEMO], t1.[PROCESSOBJECT], t1.[UPDATEDATE], t1.[UPDATEMAN], t1.[VERSION], t1.[WFCUSTOMPROCESSID], t1.[WFCUSTOMPROCESSNAME] FROM [T_SRFWFCUSTOMPROCESS] t1
